titleStmt.title: James B. Bell to Thomas E. Bramlette
CWG2209

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, Thomas E. Bramlette: Appointments by the Governor, Civil Appointments, 1863-1867

body.p:
No. 4, Cornhill Court
Boston Sept 15th, 1865
His Excellency
Thos E Bramlette
Governor of Kentucky,
Frankfort, Ky
Hona, Sir
I have the honor to solicit the appointment as Commissioner of Deeds &c. for the state of Kentucky

His Excellency John A. Andrew Governor of Massts, has honored me with a commission, and their Excellencys the Governors of Wisconsin, Pennsylvania, Rhode Island, Vermont, New Hampshire and other States, with Commissions, as Commisioner &c, and I would request the like appointment at your hands.

Trusting in a favorable consideration of my application, I remain very truly your Excellency's Servant
Jas B. Bell

Comr Deeds
Massachusetts
Jas B. Bell
comd
18 Sept/65
